The ingredients in INNOVIST’s products have stood the test of multiple global studies and have proven their efficacy over many scientific trials

Our products are Dermatologically Tested, Free of Parabens, Sulphates and Phthalates, Cruelty-Free and Vegetarian

settings.title: Paraben
settings.text:
Why is it used
Acts as a preservative

Why is it harmful?
It has Endocrine disrupting effect which may disturb various hormone levels

How do we achieve better results?
We use phenoxyethanol, sodium benzoate & Potassium sorbate. SB & PS are food grade preservatives

settings.title: Sulphate
settings.text:
Why is it used?
As a surfactant for cleansing & foam generation

Why is it harmful?
 Dermal Irritation. SLS increases Trans epidermal water loss which may cause skin inflammation

How do we achieve better results?
  We use sulphate free preservatives including isethionate, sarcosinate etc

settings.title: Phthalate
settings.text:
Why is it used?
Used as additives

Why is it harmful?
 Skin irritation potential, reproductive toxicity

How do we achieve better results?
 Non-phthalates

settings.title: Benzophenone
settings.text:
Why is it used?
Sunscreen Filter

Why is it harmful?
Absorbed through the skin because of its size & can enter into blood plasma. Can cause contact  dermatitis. Endocrine disruption effect. Harmful for coral life

How do we achieve better results?
Alternate safe sunscreen filters

settings.title: Oxybenzone
settings.text:
Why is it used?
Solvent

Why is it harmful?
Absorbed through the skin because of its size & can enter into blood plasma. Can cause contact  dermatitis. Endocrine disruption effect. Harmful for coral life

How do we achieve better results?
Alternate safe sunscreen filters

settings.title: Alcohol
settings.text:
Why is it used?
Sunscreen Filter

Why is it harmful?
Drying

How do we achieve better results?
We use solvents and other alcohols including cetyl and cetostearyl alcohol which are moisturizing.

settings.title: DMDM Hydantoin
settings.text:

 Solvent

Why is it harmful?

How do we achieve better results?
 We use phenoxyethanol, sodium benzoate & Potassium sorbate. SB & PS are food grade preservatives

settings.title: Homosalate
settings.text:

settings.title: MCIT/MIT
settings.text:

 Banned in few countries
